gameDetails.name: Ghost Stories: The Infernal Die
gameDetails.description:
Promo item given out in Essen 2011 together with a preorder of Ghost Stories: Black Secret. The die is a replacement curse die the Wu-Feng player can use instead of the normal curse die. It has a Haunt, Demon, Curse, Skeleton, and Blank (no effect) side.

It was also available from the Repos stand at Essen 2014, with a dice bag and deluxe dice.
